1.0.0.name: wordpress/pressgram
1.0.0.description:
The official WordPress plugin for Pressgram. De-clutters the home page / home screen from all those awesome images you're posting! Oh, and it also encourages digital publishers to be rebels with a cause. Viva la revolución!

This plugin allows you to select a category that will be used for your Pressgram photos (bottom of Settings Panel >> General). It will remove those photos from showing up on main feed of your blog (your homepage or main page); however, it will continue to display the photos in your search, in your archives and in your RSS feed (for yummy SEO inclusion!).

Download the mobile app here and support our community with some official swag!
